dict.string: Exaggerate stories for ‘comic’ effect but take it too far
End up spoiling my friends’ night as they need to take care of me once I’ve had too much to drink
Spend more money than planned and go over your weekly budget
After drinking too much I often have an unhealthy snack, like a kebab, on my way home
I can get quite argumentative once I have an excessive amount of alcohol
End up half asleep, unable to join in with what’s going on
